actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of June 28, 1938, as amended and supplemented to provide for emergency bank stabilization works in that reach of the Missouri River between Fort Randall and Sioux City, Iowa.

summary.text: Provides under the Flood Control Act, for emergency bank stabilization works in that reach of the Missouri River between Fort Randall and Sioux City, Iowa.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of June 28, 1938, as amended and supplemented to provide for emergency bank stabilization works in that reach of the Missouri River between Fort Randall and Sioux City, Iowa.
